name: claude-codemem
description: Local code indexing tool with semantic search for Claude Code - MCP server and CLI

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun run download-grammars && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --external @lancedb/lancedb --external better-sqlite3 && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.build:binary: bun run download-grammars && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile claudemem
scripts.build:binary:linux: bun run download-grammars && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile claudemem-linux-x64
scripts.build:binary:mac: bun run download-grammars && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile claudemem-darwin-arm64

author: Jack Rudenko <i@madappgang.com>
